name: azcli
description: Azure CLI enabler that ensures az is available and provides lifecycle tasks for upgrade guidance.

human: Install the Azure CLI following the official guidance: https://learn.microsoft.com/cli/azure/install-azure-cli
After installation, run `{CLI} . install-enabler azcli` to verify and register the tooling with the CLI.
copilot: Detect whether `az` is available by running `az version`.
If the command fails, guide the user through the OS-specific install steps documented at https://learn.microsoft.com/cli/azure/install-azure-cli before proceeding.
Once the CLI is installed, run `{CLI} . install-enabler azcli` to ensure the enabler tasks complete successfully.
